trends: There has been one other sighting in Mebane
There were no other sightings in Mebane on or around July 7th 2013
Summary: white cigar shape, appeared to be very high 40.000' plus what was unussual was no contrail, it was a clear blue sky at the time and my daughter and I noticed it rate of speed was 4 or 5 times faster then plains we regularly see fly overhead.
divs: Sighting DetailsSitting out back on the deck was looking up when I noticed a bright white cylinder or cigar shape travelling very fast overhead from NW to SE. we heard nothing and it had no contrail. sky at the time was clear blue. My daughter and I remarked that it seemed to be going way faster than commercial aircraft that we normally see. it also was not on normal flight path that the commercial jets take. I could not identify it as an airplane. just bright white. if it was a military jet it was flying faster than sound but we heard nothing. it crossed the sky in about 3 seconds, lost sight of it as it went behind trees.
